original_text: But there were not enough priests to prepare all the animals for the sacrifices. So their relatives, the Levites, helped them until they had finished the work. By that time more priests had made themselves clean to serve the Lord. (The Levites had been more careful than the priests to make themselves clean for the Lord.)
korean_text: 그런데 제사장이 부족하여 그 모든 번제 짐승들의 가죽을 능히 벗기지 못하는 고로 그의 형제 레위 사람들이 그 일을 마치기까지 돕고 다른 제사장들이 성결하게 하기까지 기다렸으니 이는 레위 사람들의 성결하게 함이 제사장들보다 성심이 있었음이라

sentences.original_text: But there were not enough priests
to prepare all the animals for the sacrifices
So their relatives, the Levites, helped them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들의 친척인 레위인들이 그들을 도왔습니다

sentences.original_text: until they had finished the work
By that time more priests had made themselves clean
sentences.korean_translation: 그때까지 더 많은 제사장들이 자신들을 정결하게 했습니다

sentences.original_text: The Levites had been more careful than the priests
to make themselves clean for the Lord
